title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.13 - Town of Lloyd
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.13 - Town of Lloyd

State Regulations
(a) US Route 9W. The northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 9W, between Route 299 and US
Route 44/55 in the Town of Lloyd. (b) US Route 44/55. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of US Route 44/55, including Mid-Hudson Bridge eastbound and
westbound roadways between US Route 9W and Ulster - Dutchess county line; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 6
p.m. and 6 a.m. and from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. in the Town of Lloyd. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8151.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
